title: Leader
responsibilities: Contributed in weekly computer club meetings and discussions
Assisted in organizing programming practice sessions
Contributed to preparation of presentations and club activities

title: Secretary of division 4 & 9
responsibilities: Managed administrative tasks for division 4 (sports) and division 9 (technology)
Coordinated events and activities for both divisions (e.g., sports tournaments, tech workshops)
Communicated with students and staff to ensure smooth operations of events
Contributed to the organization of school events and activities, such as Master of Ceremony in Education Fair and other school events

title: Penanggung Jawab Jurusan Teknik Komputer & Informatika
organization: Komisi Penyelenggara Pemira Politek Negeri Bandung
responsibilities: Organized and managed the election process for student council at Politeknik Negeri Bandung
Coordinated with candidates and election committee to ensure a fair and transparent election
